title: Bay Shrimp Salad w/ Ginger-Lime Dressing
directions: Dress the shrimp with just a little dressing
-	Using a 2” ring mold for an appetizer or a 3” ring mold for a salad, layer the ingredients like this:
-	Press lightly to “set” the mold then holding down on the food, slide the mold up and away
-	Drizzle the remaining dressing around and decorate with dots or swooshes of raspberry puree
-	NOTE: Your choice of a bit spicy by adding the jalapeno or a bit “special” by adding saffron threads but not both.
